sentences.en: A combination of cartoon, graffiti , and performance art in a minimalist, unsophisticated style late 20 th century.
sentences.cn: 综合漫画 、 涂鸦和表演艺术的艺术形式, 其风格简单自然.

sentences.en: Avid readers are more likely to read anything faster than average or minimalist readers.
sentences.cn: 书虫型读者可能读任何东西都会比一般的简单读者快一些.

sentences.en: Chomsky's minimalist approach as adopted in this dissertation is the latest development of generative theory.
sentences.cn: 本文的研究采用转化生成语法研究的创始人乔姆斯基的最简理论方案.

sentences.en: Elegantly crafted dial with a minimalist layout back engraved with the crest of the Piaget family.
sentences.cn: 简洁的表面,刻上伯爵家族徽章的表背,展现优雅的品味.

sentences.en: Everyone wants to know all the benefits of being a minimalist.
sentences.cn: 人人都想知道极简主义的好处.

sentences.en: It's a must in the bag of any minimalist, ultra - light, traveler.
sentences.cn: 对于任何极简 、 超轻旅行者来说, 这是必备的.

sentences.en: The cheapest Mac desktop, the minimalist Mac mini, is $ 599.
sentences.cn: 最便宜的苹果Mac台式机, 极简主义的Macmini售价为599美元.

sentences.en: The final design employs a minimalist style which suits modern interior design well.
sentences.cn: 产品以简约风格设计而成,以配合现代家居设计.

sentences.en: The huge branches look a little bare to me a minimalist's Christmas tree.
sentences.cn: 在我看来,那巨大的枝桠看起来有点光秃.

sentences.en: The minimalist furniture is a nice contrast in this Victorian home.
sentences.cn: 抽象主义风格的家具放在这个维多利亚风格的家居环境中显得格外与众不同.

sentences.en: There are three referential theories in discourse comprehension are approach , minimalist hypothesis and search - after - meaning theory.
sentences.cn: 语篇理解有三种推论理论:构成主义范式 、 最低限要求者假说和语义后搜索理论.

sentences.en: This functional, minimalist desk is a direct descendant of the Bauhaus movement.
sentences.cn: 这个功能, 最低限度的桌子是包豪斯运动的直接后裔.

sentences.en: This landscape appealed to his minimalist leanings.
sentences.cn: 这里的景物特别迎合他的几何线条艺术的口味.

sentences.en: This minimalist formula fitted the laissez - faire temper of the times.
sentences.cn: 这种极度简化的公式很适合当时 放任 自由的风气.

sentences.en: This principle of naming isn't in conflict with the minimalist approach.
sentences.cn: 这个命名原则与最低限要求者的方法并不冲突.

words.tran_cn: 最小化的；最小化；使达到最低限度的
最低限度地；最低程度地
量滴（液量最小单位）；极小的东西；二分音符
极简派艺术；最低纲领；极保守行动
减到最小限度；估到最低额；轻视
使减少；使缩到最小；极度轻视（minimize的过去分词形式）
使减到最少；小看，极度轻视

trans.tran_cn: 极简抽象派艺术家，极简派音乐家，保守派
